scripts.demo-install: npm --prefix ./src/Tabs/CaptureTab install ./src/Tabs/CaptureTab && npm --prefix ./src/Tabs/GettingStartedTab install ./src/Tabs/GettingStartedTab && npm --prefix ./src/SiteInspector install ./src/SiteInspector
scripts.demo-start: npm --prefix ./src/Tabs/CaptureTab run build && npm --prefix ./src/Tabs/GettingStartedTab run build && npm --prefix ./src/SiteInspector/ run start demo
